# Anthrapi

> Anthrapi is dedicated to building legacies through innovative branding solutions. This site provides information about our services, philosophy, and contact details.

Anthrapi specializes in creating enduring brands for businesses and individuals. We focus on legacy-building, creative strategy, and digital presence.

## Docs

- [Home Page](https://anthrapi.com/): Main landing page with our mission and contact info

## Optional

- [Sitemap](https://anthrapi.com/sitemap.xml): List of all indexable pages for search engines and LLMs
- [robots.txt](https://anthrapi.com/robots.txt): Crawling policy for bots and LLMs
